Dialogue.Page: Hey kiddo, how was your first flight?

DialogueOption.Text: Are the accommodations to your liking?

Dialogue.Page: Getting all formal on me now that you're part of the OWR, huh kiddo?

DialogueOption.Text: Mama, I'm just trying to do my job...

Dialogue.Page: It's cramped, and damp, and poorly furnished... but I couldn't be happier to be free from that freezing place.
"Warm Embrace", we really jinxed ourselves by picking that name huh?
Back there, I was so worried, for you especially.
Here, the air is warm, there's food, and it turns out that's all we really need.
Darter and Shiner are growing up nice and strong, I was really worried the hunger would have stunted their growth.
Sturgeon fell off the dock again after fishing too late into the night, I worry about them sometimes...
And we're all even more cramped after Sturgeon and Walleye had to move from OWR's new building.
I was told it was your job to do something about that, huh?
